review: I love my Apple Iphone 14.  It has many useful features takes great pictures and is also very attractive.
I love my new iPhone! The best part is that is not that different from my old phone but the battery is great. The camera is also wonderful.
I love iphones they are the beat i love them so much
Good size.  Works great.  Fast and love the camera.
Very Happy with my IPHONE 14  very knowledgeable customer service  very helpful staff
It was amazing service he help me with everything and it works very well

Im getting used to all the swiping but I do like the clarity of the screen.  Im disappointed that I still have to charge it on a daily basis.  I was hoping the battery would last longer.  I havent tried taking a picture yet.
Love my new  by phone! Great size takes good pics holds battery charge.
Its an Iphone. If youre in the iOS ecosystem and not a photographer stick with the standard and save some $$$
Great item love the color and the quality. Would recommend to anyone.
I have loved this phone from the day I got it would recommend it for anyone

I love how light weight it is and how it came in my favorite color Yellow. Also I drop the phone like 5 times on cement by accident without a case on it didnt even break like my iPhone 11 did. And I hardly ever charger my phone and if I have a 100 percent battery one day it can last me up to three days or more if I dont use any of my apps.
I went from an iPhone SE with 4G to this one with 5G.  Great investment!
I picked up my device after ordering online and the experience was great! Very kind and helpful associates. The phone itself was brand new and is definitely great as well!

Works as expected! Had the XR and then switched to Samsung S22 just to see if we liked it better. Had it 6 months and switched right back. Just so user friendly and smooth. Also i feel like my battery lasts so much longer than the s22. Even when both phones were in battery saving mode with Bluetooth and Wi-Fi off.
Easy transfer from my old Galaxy S7 with Move to iOS app. No assistance needed. My first Apple device and fairly intuitive interface - even for a retiree!
Love this phone. Great display very fast and long battery life between charges.
Very happy so far with my new iPhone 14 128 GB.  Pictures are supposed to be better but I cant really tell much diff from my old iPhone 8.  But screen is bigger.
I bought it for my son. It should last him through high school.
I bought this for my granddaughter as her 1st phone and she loves it.  Easy for her to set up by herself and shes only 11 years old.

Bought this for my sons birthday. His iPhone 8 gave out about a month prior so I thought a little upgrade would be nice since he was going to New York in a few weeks. I opted for this phone because of the long battery life and camera. I was expecting a ton of pics but he only sent about 5 which is fine. I guess he was living in the moment but he hasnt had any problems with it. Its quite an upgrade from the 8 for sure although its not as slim to fit in front pockets for a teenager.

Great phone!  We upgraded from the 12 to the 14 and love this phone.  Only issue is it is heavier than previous model and the trade in process was not easy at BestBuy.  I had to go to Verizon to get it done.

Awesome phone and is the perfect size. I didnt need the Pro or need a phone for anything extensive like photography or heavy application use. Its aesthetically pleasing and Apple seems to have improved the antenna reception and overall performance. Unlike previous models Im not experiencing dropped calls and device performance and network connectivity has greatly improved since my iPhone 12. Im very pleased with this purchase.
Great phone for my middle schooler. Customer service was fantastic.
I Am very Pleased with this new Iphone!! It is a great upgrade from the 8 I used to have.
Great phone for what i needed it for. My kids enjoy their iphones.
I like it simple is that best color yet and screen is awesome
This was for my son he and I like it so much that I am about to switch from Samsung to this phone

What can I say its an iPhone thats known for its ease of use and has lots of pluses. This is my first iPhone so still learning my way around. So far everything working as it should. Fingerprint and facial recognition work easily. Apps are plentiful. Suggestion: Get a case and screen protector as an unprotected phone can be damaged easily if it falls on a hard surface and these help protect your investment and resale value.
New Phone for teenage daughter.  Replacing older model with more memory.  Phone and functionality is great.
Camera is the best. My pictures come out amazing !!
my iphone 14 is so awesome i honestly enjoy every feature i love the point five feature and i love the fact its not that huge

Easy to use and screen is big and clear. I am happy that it is so similar to my previous phone that makes for easy transition.
Love my new phone and the process was so fast.  Alyson was so helpful!
I love my iPhone. As a first time IPhone user I am pretty pleased. The Best Buy associates set it all up for me in store. They also answered all of my questions.

My iPhone 11 was failing and I needed to replace it.  My first iPhone was an iPhone 4 and I will continue to buy them.  This one has the Satellite SOS feature which is free for the next two years.  This will give me peace of mind when hiking in the back country.
The I 14 phone is real nice. The associate  who  did the transaction was very good.

Good product I love the iPhone its nice big super cool color

new to Iphone - had a droid - so trying to navigate through everything is a challenge - having issues with group texts Im not receiving them all - did shut the phone down and restarted and the texts still did not show up

the phone is pretty - I just dont like when shutting the screen down the side buttons on each side get pressed together when trying to just press the one and then a picture is taken - also the button to silence the phone is hard for my finger to reach in to move it

Apple makes the best cellphone on the market hands down

Really Fast coming from Iphone 11. Next phone is the Iphone 15
I love my new iPhone 14 I always had the Anthoid phones and am happy I switched to apple
Great Phone - A little smaller than my iPhone 11 which I love.  Camera is definitely better.  Battery lasts a long time.  Purchased fast charge block 30 minutes to full charge.  Love it

This phone is a lemon.  At first the problem was blamed on T-Mobile--poor reception in the area where I live.  So I switched to Verizon which did not solve the problem.  I am TIRED of friends and businesses telling me that they cannot understand me because I am breaking up.  I have made at least a half dozen calls and drove 40-60 miles to two different Verizon stores hoping to resolve this.  The nearest Best Buy (where I bought it) is a two hour drive.  Hopefully that will be more productive than the hours I have spent on the phone talking to T-Mobile and Verizon attempting to resolve this!  Best Buy needs to exchange this for a phone that works properly!
Love Apple products and this ones no different. A bit expensive but its quantity.
Love it works great and the red color is the most gorgeous iPhone color ever
Absolutely love it took a bit of setup out of the box but Apple makes it super easy.
Liked my android better as its easier and does more for me
Very pleased with functionality size & weight of this phone.

Awesome phone replaced my iPhone X. Great deal and excellent quality!
I previously had a Samsung galaxy S8.It was time for a new phone.This phone is acceptable.The quality may be slightly better.
Purchased this phone for my son and he said it is awesome way better than the iPhone XR he previously was using.
Always love Apple products and this phone does not disappoint. Color is gorgeous display is so crisp and clear! Great upgrades to the camera as well.
Always love Apple products and this phone does not disappoint. Color is gorgeous display is so crisp and clear! Great upgrades to the camera as well.

Ive had this phone for about four weeks now and I absolutely hate it. When you spend a lot of money on a new phone and out of the box apple cant be bothered to send you a charger its very irritating and this phone requires more juice to charge quickly. Then after you finally get the phone charged up this ESim stuff is a nightmare. It seems like apple just likes to make everyones lives miserable every few years and Im not sure why I put up with it. Since there is no SIM card there is no easy way to transfer my number to this phone. I ended up having to call my provider multiple times before I could get it properly activated. This wasted another 2 hours of my life and frustration of having to deal with support. The other thing I hate about this ESim is when Im traveling I cant just pop in a sim from the country Im in and go about my day. Now I have to pay overpriced roaming from my current provider. Overall I would not buy this product again!! I have had it with apple I have been a die hard fan for years but I honestly think Im going to sell this phone and get an android.
Awesome phone. Sleek display with decent battery. Good price.
Takes excellent Photos and great color! Easy to find a case for.
Its an apple. So far so good. Great camera quality loads pretty quick
Great experience no hassle. The merchandise was as expected.

Daughter needed a new phone as her xr was not working. This is a bit smaller which she liked with more memory. Disappointed the charging block not included but that is an apple issue. Otherwise working well. Set up in the store was great!

So far so good. I used android since I got a cellphone 30 years ago. What a difference!! Easy to learn how to use for a senior population member. I highly recommend. I was afraid of the smaller keyboard. No problem!!
Long overdue upgrade from iPhone 7 to 14. Totally worth it especially when adding a Verizon plan upgrade (that actually reduced our monthly cost) and the 0% financing and Best Buy incentives.
Took a little time getting used to the new phone but I love it!
This phone is GREAT!  an upgrade for son who was on a SLOW iphone 11.  Three years is about the most for a battery.  Sure wish apple would allow easy battery changes
